name: Scoia'tael Scout
description: Most scoia'tael members have at one point or another been assigned as scouts for a commando, which means most scoia'tael scouts are generally more junior members of the organization, and generally younger. They are trained in both close and long range combat, and they emphasize retreat and caution over heroics. All scoia'tael members are trained to have a vial of poison at hand, to enhance their attacks and to have more opportunities if they were to get captured.

passives.name: Forest Shadow
passives.description: The skirmisher has advantage on stealth checks, and they count as having full cover when they have three-quarters cover.

passives.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
passives.description: The scout deals an extra 7  (2d6)  damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the scout that isn't incapacitated and the scout doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The archer makes two Shortsword, Shortbow or Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:   +6  to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.  Hit:  5  (1d4 + 3)  piercing damage plus 10  (3d6)  poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Nimble Training (4/Day)
bonusActions.description: The scout can disengage as a bonus action, and it gets 5 extra feet of movement speed while disengaging.
